    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object clone() 
      double getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> hyp, CoverageSet newCoverage)
      For a given coverage set C of a given hypothesis, this finds all contiguous segments in the coverage set (e.g., if C = {1,5,6,10}, then segments are {5-6} and {10}), and computes future cost as follows: fcost(C) = fcost(1-10) - fcost(5-6) - fcost(10).

      • Methods inherited from class edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.h.DTUIsolatedPhraseForeignCoverageHeuristic

      • getHeuristicDelta

        public double getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> hyp,
                       CoverageSet newCoverage)
        For a given coverage set C of a given hypothesis, this finds all contiguous segments in the coverage set (e.g., if C = {1,5,6,10}, then segments are {5-6} and {10}), and computes future cost as follows: fcost(C) = fcost(1-10) - fcost(5-6) - fcost(10). This does not overestimate future cost (as opposed to getHeuristicDeltaStandard), even when dealing with discontinuous phrases. However, future cost estimate is often poorer than with getHeuristicDeltaStandard.
        Specified by:
        getHeuristicDelta in interface SearchHeuristic<TK,FV>
        Overrides:
        getHeuristicDelta in class DTUIsolatedPhraseForeignCoverageHeuristic<TK,FV>
